name: Amazing Camel Joy Ride
description:
Camels have been taken as rides so as to cover longer distances in Desert.
This Ship of the Desert is the tallest and hard working of all animals.

Have you ever Wondered how it would feel as a camel over the deserts and other hot places?
Play as Camel in this Amazing Camel Joy Ride Game and have fun by helping lonely passengers in desserts.Help them reach their destinations.
So, now get started with it and play in all scenic and happening environments.
Thank you Happy Camel you are so generous.
